name: VIR-264.01 Verify that the following information is shown at the slot 1

userStory.narrative:
As a customer I would like to see the From family (series) selection,
show image, general description, general
features and material description on the pdp in the first content slot

title: VIR-264.01 Verify that the following information is shown at the slot 1
description:
Examples:
|info|
|From family series|
|image|
|general description|
|general features|
|Material Description|
